title: Captain GP skin
body:
Hey guys, I've recently found that if I play gp in a matchmaking game I'll receive capatain gp for free on patch 5.15.
My question is:
If I played him during free champions rotations , does it mean that I'll get his captain gp skin or do I need to buy him first and just then I'll have to play a matchmaking game in order to get his free skin?
{{champion:41}} {{champion:41}} {{champion:41}} 
Thx for help!

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Hollymonster,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=jPwTdBly,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2015-08-07T20:24:56.672+0000)
>
> Sorry Wuks, this is actually wrong.  You need to own Gangplank to get the skin for free.
> 
> "TLDR: Bilgewater: Burning Tides sails away on August 10 at 2:00 AM PDT. You can earn the free Captain Gangplank skin** if you own the champion** and play a full matchmade game with him (or if you’ve already played at least one) before the event ends."

Sorry Wuks, this is actually wrong.  You need to own Gangplank to get the skin for free.

"TLDR: Bilgewater: Burning Tides sails away on August 10 at 2:00 AM PDT. You can earn the free Captain Gangplank skin** if you own the champion** and play a full matchmade game with him (or if you’ve already played at least one) before the event ends."
